Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2023/0330 b) Date of Occurrence: 31/01/2023
c) Installation Details: Minotaur Heavy - AC-7673-216 at
Regional Depot-A
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Electrical b) Date Component 04/02/2023
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Power Distribution d) Main Assembly: Station-1 Port
e) Nomenclature: Power Distribution Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: MOD-A
g) Part No.: EL-7280-H1 h) Sl No.: SN-6523-561
i) Firmware Version: FW-6.11.180 j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 02/04/2021 l) Date of Removal: 02/02/2023
Pg No: 34 Ln No: 21 Pg No: 70 Ln No: 3
m) Manufacturing Agency: Stellar Avionics Ltd n) Date, Month & Year March 2018
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: No p) Whether under AMC No
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 4080 Hrs / 1661 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Voltage fluctuation in primary bus system. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 02/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings.
Date: 03/03/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions.
Date: 04/03/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur.
Date: 07/03/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type.
Date: 12/03/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
